channel.title: Plz help
channel.description: :eek:how do i make myself a donator on a rsps ; also how do i find a npc thats not in the right place plz help.

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

In shop.cfg the shop will have it’s own number. Depending on your source you search for that number in your files. Off the top of my head, let’s say the shop number is 43. In delta, you can justt search wanneShop = 43; and you will find the NPC that coorresponds with that shop. You can change the NPC ID to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

Are you making your own private server? They way you asked for donator is kind of funny… Just explore which is the right number for donator. Go to your source files and find your character files. Edit your own and you will see something in there called Character-Rights, or something similar to that. It will have a corresponding number to it. Change that. Normally numbers only go up to 3-4. So try and find the right one.
If you want to change the location of an NPC or delete it for that matter, find out the coordinates it is currently standing at. Go to your autospawn.cfg file and find the coordinates that are the same as the ones that the NPC is standing at, change those numbers, or delete the entire line.

Read full topic
